text: karlengleah( del ach vil tralb tow ruomorsa cheamuoy phriyea vinh ban) ku mean chamnuon pir dng . dau che neah puok anak ach ruomorsa chea muoy phriyea vinh( kraoypi karlengleah ni muoy ) knong pheap brapei ryy ach lengleah puok neang aoy dach sralah knong pheap brapei der . haey puok anak min ach yk avei( brak khansla ning tropy phe sa ng tiet) del puok anak ban phdal aoy puok neang laey leuklengte puokke teangpir baromph khlach ( kar ruomorsa cheamuoyoknea) min ach anouvotd chbab robsa a l laoh ban bonnaoh . dau che neah brasenbae puok anak baromph khlach puokke teangpir min ach anouvotd chbab robsa a l laoh ban ku kmean tosapei avei laey champoh puokke teangpir bae neang prom sang( brak khansla) vinh noh . noh ku chea chbab robsa a l laoh . dau che neah chaur puok anak kom bampean leu vea aoy saoh . haey anaknea del bampean chbab robsa a l laoh anak teangnoh kuchea puok lmeusa
